column5: Well picked up my new fishing boat last week. Bought a Crestliner 1600 SC from the dealer in Edmonton. Price was good or at least I think so ($13500 plus GST) which included everything to go boating (4 life jackets, anchor, travel tarp, safety equipment, paddles etc). Boat came with a 50 HP Merc 2 stroke which I plan to upgrade next year to a 75 hp Optimax. Just didn't have enuff pennies this year to do it. Also came with a wireless Motorguide bow mount motor.  Anyways, here is a pic of it resting comfortably in the shop waiting for open water.
Wow, that's a beauty  . I would love to have that boat. Great looking colour scheme ... love it.
Sssssswwwwweeeeeeeetttttttttt!!!!!!  Congrats and many happy returns (fish that is)  reefrunner
That IS a great looking boat John. I'm sure you'll have a wonderful season with it. Thanks for showing it.
nice looking boat,congrats
Couple rod holders and you'z good to go ! Congrats !!!!!
Very nice!
Beauty boat!  Now get out there and get it fished up and slimy!  Sherriff
Very nice John and you'll be more than happy with it !!  I've had a 1650 SC for 8 years now without a single complaint.
That's a beauty of a boat. Almost time to test her out.
very nice looking boat there!
Nice ride - congrats!!!
Nice!  But I don't know which I like better, your new boat or that nice 3 car garage.
Nice boat! I think that 50HP will push it along just fine! -Brian
nice looking boat there must be open water some where
Nice boat John! I'm picking mine up this week (also a 1600SC).
Very sweet ride John ... you'll have a blast in it.
Thats a great looking boat you got there  Rob
wow what a great looking boat!  Cheers!

Very nice!!!!   A few points to remember:  1. No banana's on board 2. Do not try to sell for 100% profit on the board next week 3. Do not to try to sell next week, because it is too big 4. HAVE LOTS OF FUN and POST LOTS OF PICS
Nice fishin machine, that should improve your luck this season. Cheers
Nice boat, only one problem, its not in the water.   I'm sure it won't be in the water  soon enough,good luck with the new fishing                                  machine
Nice Ride, i've also run a crestliner cv182 for a few years, love it. btw dont get caught up in horsepower......gas in barrie today 1.12/ltr, should be 1.20 by the long weekend in May.
I was thinking the same thing....... John...very nice Bud...... it shure looks sweet...I hope for you much fun and success on the water.
